text:
Created attachment 31311
Patch for /etc/init.d/tomcat6

If tomcat is not running but /var/run/tomcat6.pid still exists, the 'status' command will exit without outputting any message or setting the correct RETVAL. It *should* be a relatively easy fix, I've submitted a patch with the ticket.
creator: evan.stachowiak@here.com

text: That is not a script provided by the Tomcat project. I suspect you need to contact the person/organization that produced the package you are using.
creator: markt@apache.org
